author: Marc Stein
text: Update: Luka Dončić has been cleared to play for Slovenia in Tuesday night’s home game against Great Britain.

author: Marc Stein
text:
Luka Dončić is scheduled to be back at practice Monday, Slovenia’s basketball federation (@kzs_si) has announced, with his official status still TBD for Tuesday’s @EuroBasket warmup game at home against Great Britain.

More NBA from me: https://t.co/K79KvJ5u6I

author: Shams Charania
text: The Miami Heat are signing guard Dru Smith on new a three-year contract, sources tell ESPN. Smith has developed within the Heat program and has overcome season-ending ACL and Achilles tendon injuries in each of the past two years. https://t.co/q4wjv89FrS

author: Marc Stein
text: Luka Dončić has been diagnosed with a right knee contusion, sources briefed on the situation tell @TheSteinLine, but the injury he sustained today with Slovenia’s national team is not believed to be serious.
